title: [Large-Scale] Self-Directed Mathematics Learning Design Based on Real-Time Streaming

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of basic mathematical concepts (intermediate level)
context.additional_context: Flexible blended environment combining synchronous interaction and asynchronous learning, enabling self-directed study outside work hours for employed professionals

learning_goals: Learners achieve over 80% participation rates using interactive tools (whiteboard, real-time polls, etc.) provided by live streaming platforms
Learners enhance self-directed learning competencies by over 90% based on self-assessment tools during weekly learning planning and implementation
Learners generate at least two peer collaboration cases in mathematical problem-solving processes through real-time Q&A sessions and asynchronous discussion boards
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
